Translations.Text: (Hazrat Ibrahim alh-e-salam) ney kaha kay Allah kay bhejay huye (farishton!)tumhara kiya maqsad hai
Unhon ney jawab diya kay hum gunagar qom ki taraf bhejay gaye hain
Takay hum unn per kitti kay kankar barsayen
Jo teray rab ki taraf say nishan zada hain unn had say guzar janay walon kay liye
Pus jitney eman walay wahan thay hum ney unhen nikal liya
Aur hum ney wahan musalmanon ka sirf aik hi ghar paya
Aur wahan hum ney unkay liye jo dardnaak azab ka darr rakhtey hain aik(kamil) alamat chori
Musa(alh-e-salam kay qissay) mein (bhi humari taraf say tanbeeh hai) kay hum ney ussay firaon ki taraf khuli daleel dey ker bheja
Pus uss ney apney balbootay per mun mora aur kehney laga yeh jadoogar hai ya deewana hai
Bil-aakhir hum ney ussay aur uss kay lashkaron ko apney azab mein pakar ker darya mein daal diya woh tha hi malamat kay qabil
Iss tarah aadiyon mein bhi (humari taraf say tanbeeh hai) jabkay hum ney unn say khali aandhi bheji
Woh jiss jiss cheez per girti thi ussay boseedah hadi ki tarah (choora choora) kerdeti thi
Aur samood (kay qissay) mein bhi (ibrat) hai jab unsay kaha gaya kay tum kuch dino tak faeedah uthalo
Lekin unhon ney apney rab kay hukum say sirtabi ki jiss per unhen unkay dekhtay dekhtay (tez-o-tund) karakay ney halak kerdiya
Pus na woh kharay hosakay aur na badla ley sakay
Aur Nooh(alh-e-salam) ki qom ka bhi iss say pehlay (yehi haal ho chuka tha) woh bhi baray nafarman log thay
Aasman ko hum ney (apney) hathon say banaya hai aur yaqeenan hum kushadgi kernay walay hain
Aur zamin ko hum ney farsh banadiya hai pus hum boht hi achay bichanay walay hain
Aur her cheez ko hum ney jora jora peda kiya hai takay tum naseehat hasil kero
Pus tum Allah ki taraf dor bhag (yani rujoo) kero yaqeenan main tumhen uss ki taraf say saaf saaf tanbeeh kernay wala hun
Aur Allah kay sath kissi aur ko mabood na therao. be-shak mein tumhen uss ki taraf say khula daraney wala hun
Issi tarah jo log inn say pehlay guzray hain unkay pass jo bhi rasool aaya unhon ney keh diya ya to yeh jadoogar hai ya deewana hai
Kiya yeh iss baat ki aik doosray ko wassiyat kertay gaye hain
(Nahi) bulkay yeh sab kay sab sirkash hain to app inn say mun pher len. aap per koi malamat nahi
Aur naseehat kertay rahen yaqeenan yeh naseehat eman walon ko nafa degi
Mein ney jinnat aur insanon ko mehaz issi liye peda kiya hai kay woh sirf meri ibadat keren
Na mein inn say rozi chchta hun na meri yeh chahat hai kay yeh mujhay khilayen
Allah taalaa to khud hi sab ka rozi rasan tawanaee wala aur zor awar hai
Pus jin logon ney zulm kiya hai unhen bhi unkay sathiyon kay hissay kay nuisil hissa mileyga lehaza woh mujh say jaldi talab na keren
Pus kharabi hai munkiron ko unkay uss din ki jiss ka wada diye jatay hain
Qasam hai toor ki
Aur likhi hui kitab ki
Jo jhilli kay khulay huye warq mein hai
Aur abad ghar ki
Aur unchi chat ki
Aur bharkaye huye samandar ki
Be-shak app kay rab ka azab hoker rehnay wala hai
Ussay koi rokney wala nahi
Jiss din aasman thar tharaney lagay ga
Aur pahaar chalney phirney lagen gey
uss din jhutlaney walon ki (poori) kharabi hai
Jo apni behuda goee mein uchal kood ker rahey hain
Jiss din woh dhakkay dey ker aatish jahannam ki taraf laye jayen gey
Yehi wohi aatish dozakh hai jissay tum jhoot batlatey thay
(Abb batao) kiya yeh jadoo hai? ya tum dekhtay hi nahi ho
Jao dozakh mein abb tumhara sabar kerna aur na kerna tumharay liye yaksan hai tumhein faqat tumharay kiye ka badla diya jayega
Yaqeenan perhezgar log jannaton mein aur nematon mein hain
Jo unhen unkay rab ney dey rakhi hain uss per khush khush hain aur unkay perwerdigar ney unhen jahannam kay azab say bhi bacha liya hai
Tum mazay say khatay peetay raho inn aemaal kay badlay jo tum kertay thay
Baraber bichay huye shandar takhtay per takkiye lagaye huye aur hum ney unkay nikkah bari bari aankhon wali(hooron) say kerdiye hain
Aur jo log eman laye aur unki olad ney bhi eman mein unki perwi ki hum unki olad ko unntak phoncha dengey aur unkay amal say hum kuch kum na keren gey.her shaks apney aemaal ka girwi hai
Hum unkay liye meway aur marghoob gosht ki rail pail kerden gey
(khush tabaee kay sath) aik doosray say jam (sharab) ki cheena jhapta keren gey jiss sharab kay suroor mein to beyhuda goee hogi na gunah
Aur unkay gird unkay no-umer ghulam chal phir rahey hongey goya kay woh moti thay ji dhakay rakhay thay
Aur aapas mein aik doosray ki taraf mutawajja hoker sawal kerengey
kahen gey iss say pehlay hum apney ghar walon kay dar miyan boht dara kertay thay
Pus Allah taalaa ney hum per bara ehsan kiya aur humen tez-o-tund garum hawaon kay azab say bacha liya
Hum iss say pehlay hi uss ki ibadat kiya kertay thay be-shak woh mohsin aur meharban hai
To aap samjhatay rahen kiyoh kay app apney rab kay fazal say na to kaahin hain na deewana
Kiya kafir yun kehtay hain kay yeh shaeer hai hum iss per zamaney kay hawadis (yani mot) ka intezar ker rahey hain
Keh dijiye! tum muntazir raho mein bhi tumharay sath intezar kernay walon mein hun
Kiya inki aqlen enhen yehi sikhati hain? ya yeh log hi sirkash hain
Kiya yeh kehtay hain kay iss nabi ney khud qharh liya hai waqya yeh hai kay woh eman nahi latey
Acha agar yeh sachay hain to bhala iss jaisi aik (hi) baat yeh (bhi) to ley aayen
Kiya yeh baghair kissi(peda kernay walay) kay khud ba khud peda hogaye hain? ya yeh khud peda kernay walay hain
Kiya inhon ney hi aasman aur zamin ko peda kiya hai? bulkay yeh yaqeen na kernay walay log hain
ya kiya inkay pass teray rab kay khazaney hain?ya (in khazanon kay) yeh darogha hain
Ya kiya inkay pass koi seerhi hai jiss per charh ker suntay hain?(agar aisa hai) to inka sunnay wala koi roshan daleel pesh keray
Kiya Allah ki to sab larkiyan hain aur tumharay han larkay hain
Kiya tu inn say koi ujrat talab kerta hai kay yeh uskay tawaan say bojhal ho rahey hain
Kiya inkay pass ilm-e-gheeib hai jissay yeh likh letay hain
Kiya yeh log koi fareb kerna chahtay hain? to yaqeen kerlen kay fareeb khordah kafir hi hain
Kiya Allah kay siwa inka koi mabood hai? (hergiz nahi) Allah taalaa inkay shirk say pak hai
Agar yeh log aasman kay kissi tukray ko girta hua dekhlen tab bhi yeh keh den key yeh teh-ba-teh badal hai
Tu enhen chor dey yahan tak kay enhen uss din say sabiqa paray jiss mein yeh beyhosh kerdiye jayen gey
Jiss din enhen inka makar kuch kaam na dey ga aur na woh madad kiye jayen gey
Be-shak zalimon kay liye iss kay ilawa aur azab bhi hain lekin inn logon mein say aksar bey-ilm hain
Tu apney rab kay hukum kay intezar kein sabar say kaam ley be-shak tu humari aankhon kay samney hai subah ko jab tu uthay apney rab ki paki aur hamd biyan ker
Aur raat ko bhi usski tasbeeh parh aur sitaron kay doobtay waqt bhi
Qasam hai sitarey ki jab woh girey
Kay tumharey sathi ney na raah gum ki hai na woh terhi raah per hai
Aur na woh apni khuwaish say koi baat kehtay hain
Woh to sirf wahi hai jo utari jaati hai
Issay poori taqat walay farishtey ney sikhaya hai
Jo zor -aawar hai phir woh seedha khara hogaya
Aur woh buland aasmanon kay kinaron per tha
Phir nazdeek hua aur utar aaya
Pus woh do kamanon kay ba-qadar fasla reh gaya bulkay iss say bhi kum
Pus uss ney ALLAH kay bandaey ko wahi phonchaee jo bhi phonchaee
Dil ney jhoot nahi kaha jissay (payghumber ney) dekha
Kiya tum jhagra kertay ho iss per jo (payghumber) dekhtey hain
Issay to aik martaba aur bhi dekha tha
Sidrat-ul-muntaha kay pass
Issi kay pass jannat-ul-maawa hai
Jabkay sidrah ko chupaye leti thi woh cheez jo uss per cha rahi thi
Na to nigah behki na had say barhi
Yaqeenan uss ney apney rab ki bari bari nishaniyon mein say baaz nishaniyan dekha len
Kiya tum ney laat aur uzza ko dekha
Aur manaat teesray pichlay ko
Kiya tumharay liye larkay aur ALLAH kay liye larkiya hain
Yeh to abb bari beyinsafi ki taqseem hai

DAR-asal yeh sirf naam hain jo tum ney aur tumharay baap dadon ney inkay rakh liye hain Allah ney inki koi daleel nahi utaari yeh log to sirf atkal kay aur apni nafsaani khuwaishon kay peechay paray huye hain aur yaqeenan unkay rab ki taraf say unkay pass hidayat aa chuki hai
Kiya her shaks jo aarzoo keray ussay mayassar hai
Allah hi kay hath hai yeh hajaan aur woh jahaan
Aur boht say farishtay aasmanon mein hain jinki sifarish kuch bhi nafa nahi dey sakti magar yeh aur baat hai kay Allah taalaa apni khushi aur apni chahat say jioss kay liye chahye ijazat dey dey
Be-shak jo log aakhirat per eman nahi rakhtay woh farishton ka zanana naam muqarrar kertay hain
Halankay unhen iss ka koi ilm nahi woh sirf apney gumaan kay peechay paray huye hain aur be-shak weham(o-guman) haq kay muqablay mein kuch kaam nahi deta
To app iss say mun mor len jo humari yaad say mun moray aur jinka iradah ba-juz zindagan-e-duniya kay aur kuch na ho
Yehi inn kay ilm ki inteha hai aap ka rab iss say khoob waqif hai jo iss ki raah say bhatak gaya hai aur wohi khoob waqif hai iss say bhi jo raah yafta hai

Aur Allah hi ka hai jo kuch aasmanon mein hai. aur jo. kuch zamin mein hai takay Allah taalaa buray amal kerney walon ko unkay aemaal ka badla dey aur nek kaam kerney walon ko acha badla inayat farmaye

Inn logon ko jo baray gunahon say bachtay hain aur beyhayaee say bhi siwaye kissi chotay say gunah kay be-shak tera rab boht kushada maghfirat wala hai woh tumhen bakhoobi jaanta hai jabkay uss ney tumhen zamin say peda kiya aur jabkay tum apni maaon kay pet mein bachay thay pus tum apni pakeezgi aap biyan na kero wohi pehezgaron ko khoob janta hai
Kiya app ney ussay dekha jiss ney mun mor liya
Aur boht kuin diya aur hath kio rok liya
Kiya ussay ilm-e-ghaib hai kay woh (sab kuch) dekh raha hai
Kiya ussay iss cheez ki khabar nahi di gaee jo musa (alh-e-salam) kay kay
Aur wafadaar Ibrahim (alh-e-salam) kay saheefon mein tha
Kay koi shaks kissi doosray ka bojh na uthayega
Aur yeh kay her insan kay liye sirf wohi hai jiss ki kosish khud uss ney ki
Aur yeh kay be-shak uss ki kosish unqareeb dekhi jayegi
Phir ussay poora poora badla diya jayega
Aur yeh kay aap kay rab hi ki taraf phonchna hai
Aur yeh kay wohi hansata hai aur wohi rulata hai
Aur yeh kay wohi maarta hai aur jilata hai
Aur yeh kay ussi ney jora yani nar-o-mada peda kiya hai
Nutfay say jabkay woh tapkaya jata hai
Aur yeh kay ussi kay zimmey doobara peda kerna hai
Aur yeh kay wohi maaldar banata hai aur sarmaya deta hai
Aur yeh kay wohi sheyara (sitaray) ka rab hai
Aur yeh kay ussi ney aad awwal ko halak kiya hai
Aur samood ko bhi (jin men say) aik ko bhi baqi na rakha
Aur iss say pehlay Qom-e-nooh ko yaqeenan woh baray zalim aur sirkash thay
Aur motafiqa (shehar ya utti hui bastiyon ko) ussi ney ulat diya
Phir uss per cha diya jo chaya
Pus aey insan tu apney rab ki kiss neimat kay baray mein jhagray ga
Yeh (nabi) daranay walay hain pehlay daramay walon mensay
Aanay wali ghari qareeb aagaee hai
Allah kay siwa iss ka (waqt moayyen per khol) dikhaney wala koi nahi
Pus tum kiya iss baat say tajjub kertay ho
Aur hans rahey ho? rotay nahi
(Bulkay) tum khel rahey ho
Abb Allah kay samney sajday kero aur (ussi ki) ibadat kero
Qayamat qareeb agaee aur chand phat gaya
Yeh agar koi mojzza dekhtay hain to mun pher letay hain aur kehdetay hain. kay yeh pehlay say chala aata hua jadoo hai
inhon ney jhutlaya aur apni khuwaishon ki pairwi ki aur her kaam theray huye waqt per muqarrar hai
yaqeenan inn kay pass woh khabren aa chuki hain jin mein dant dapat (ki naseehat) hai
Aur kamil aqal ki baat hai lekin in darawni baaton ney bhi kuch faeedah na diya
Pus (aey nabi) tum inn say aeyraaz kero jiss din aik pukarnay wala nagawaar cheez ki taraf pukaray ga
yeh jhuki aankhon qabron say iss tarah nikal kharay hongay kay goya woh phela hua taddi dal hai
Pukarnay walay ki taraf dortay hongay aur kafir kahengey yeh din to boht sakht hai
Inn say pehlay qom-e-nooh ney bhi humaray banday ko jhulaya tha aur deewana batla ker jhirak diya gaya tha
Pus uss ney apney rab say dua ki kay mein beybus hun tu meri madad ker
Pus hum ney aasman kay darwazon ko zor kay menh say khol diya
Aur zamin say chashmon ko jaari kerdiya pus uss kaam kay liye jo muqaddar kiya gaya tha (dono) paani jama hogaye
Aur hum ney issay takhton aur keelon wali (kashti) per sawar kerliya
Jo humari aankhon kay samnay chal rahi thi badla uss ki taraf say jiss ka kufur kiya gaya tha
Aur be-shak hum ney iss waqaey ko nishani bana ker baqi rakha pus koi hai naseehat hasil kerney wala
Batao mera azab aur meri daraney wali baaten kaisi rahen
Aur be-shak hum ney quran ko samajhney kay liye aasan kerdiya hai pus kiya koi naseehat hasil kerney wala hai
Qom-e-aad ney bhi jhutlaya pus kaisa hua mera azab aur meri daraney wali baten
Hum ney unn per tez-o-tund musalsal chalney wali hawa aik peham manhoos din mein bhej di
Jo logon ko utha utha ker dey patakhti thi goya kay woh jarr say katey huye khajoor kay taney hain
Pus kaisi rahi meri saza aur mera darana
Yaqeenan hum ney quran ko naseehat kay liye aasan kerdia hai pus kiya koi hai naseehat hasil kerney wala
Qom-e-samood ney daraney walon ko jhutlaya
Aur kehney lagay kiya humi mein say aik shaks ki hum farmanbardaari kerney lagen? tab to hum yaqeenan ghalati aur deewangi mein paray huye hongey
Kiya humaray sab kay darmiyan sirf issi per wahi utaari gaee nahi bulkay woh jhoota shekhi khor hai
Abb sab jaan lengey kal ko kay kon jhoota aur shekhi khor tha
Be-shak hum unki aazmaeesh kay liye untni bhejen gey pus (aey saleh) tu inka muntazir reh aur sabar ker
Han enhen khabar kerdey kay paani in mein taqseem shuda hai her aik apni baari per hazir hoga
Unhon ney apney sathi ko awaz di jiss ney (untni per) waar kiya aur (uss ki) kochen kaat den
Pus kiyon ker hua mera azab aur mera darana
Hum ney unn per aik cheekh bheji pus aisay hogaye jaisay baar bananay walay ki rondhi hui ghaas
Aur hum ney naseehat kay liye quran ko aasan kerdia hai pus kiya hai koi jo naseehat qabool keray
Qom-e-Loot ney bhi daraney walon ki takzeeb ki
Be-shak hum ney unn per pathar barsaney wali hawa bheji siwaye loot(alh-e-salam) kay ghar walon kay waqt nijat deydi
Apney ehsan say her her shukarguzaar ko hum issi tarah badla detay hain
Yaqeenan loot (alh-e-salam) ney unhen humari pakar say daraya tha lekinunhon ney daraney walon kay baray mein (shak-o-shuba aur) jhagra kiya
Aur inn loot (alh-e-salam) ko unkay mehmanon kay baray mein phuslaya pus hum ney unki aankhen andhi kerden (aur kehdia) mera azab aur mera darana chakho
Aur yaqeeni baat hai kay unhen subah saweray hi aik jagah pakarney walay muqarra azab ney ghaarat kerdia
Pus meray azab aur meray darawey ka maza chakho
Aur yaqeenan hum ney quran ko Pind-o-waaz kay liye aasan kerdia hai pus kiya koi hai naseehat pakarney wala
Aur firaoniyon kay pass bhi daraney walay aaye
Unhon ney humari tamamnishaniyan jhutlayen pus hum ney unhen baray ghalib qavi pakarney walay ki tarah pakar liya
(Aey qureshiyo!) kiya tumharay kafir inn kafiron say kuch behtar hain? ya tumharay liye agli kitabon mein chutkara likha hua hai
Ya yeh kehtay hain kay hum ghalba panay wali janat hain
Unqareeb yeh jamat shikast di jayegi aur peeth deyker bhagey gi
Bulkay qayamat ki ghari unkay waday kay waqt hai aur qayamat bari sakht aur kerwi cheez hai
Be-shak gunehgaar gumrahi mein aur azab mein hain
Jiss din woh apney mun kay bal aag mein ghaseetay jayen gey.(aur unn say kaha jayega) dozakh ki aag lagney kay mazay chakho
Be-shak hum ney her cheez ko aik (muqarra) andazay per peda kia hai
Aur humara hukum sirf aik dafa (ka aik kalma) hi hota hai jaisey aankh ka jhapakna
Aur hum ney tum jaisey bohteron ko halak kerdia hai pus koi hai naseehat lenay wala
Jo kuch enhon ney (aemaal) kiye hain sab naam-e-aemaal mein likhay huye hain
(Issi tarah) her choti bari baat bhi likhi hui hai
Yaqeenan humara darr rakhney walay jannaton aur neharon mein hongay
Raasti aur izzat ki bethak mein qudrat walay badshah kay pass
Rehman ney
Quran sikhaya
Ussi ney insan ko peda kiya
Aur ussay bolna sikhaya
Aftab aur mahtab (muqarra) hisab hain
Aur sitaray aur darakht dono sajdah kertay hain
Ussi ney aasman ko buland kiya aur ussi ney tarazoo rakhi
Takay tum tolnay mein tajawuzz na kero
Insaf kay sath wazan ko theek rakho aur tol mein kum na do
Aur ussi ney makhlooq kay liye zameen bichadi
Jiss mein meway hain aur khoshay walay khajoor kay darakht hain
Aur bhuss wala anaj hai aur khushboodar phool hain
Pus (aey insano aur jinno!) tum apney perwerdigaar ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Uss ney insan ko bajney wali mitti say peda kiya jo theekri ki tarah thi
Aur jinnaat ko aag kay sholay say peda kiya
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Woh rab hai dono mashriqon aur dono maghribon ka
To(aey jinno aur insano) tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Uss ney do darya jaari kerdiye jo aik doosray say nil jaatay hain
Inn dono mein aik aar hai kay uss say barh nahi saktay
Pus apney perwerdigaar ki kon kon si nemat ko jhutlao hey
Inn dono mein say miti aur mongey baraamad hotay hain
Phir tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Aur Allah hi ki (milkiyat mein) hain woh jahaaz jo samandaron mein pahaar ki tarah buland (chal phir rahey) hain
Pus (aey insano aur jinno!) tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Zamin per jo hain sab fana honay walay hain
Sirf teray rab ki zaat jo azmat aur izzat wali hai baqi reh jayegi
Phir tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Sab aasman-o-zamin walay ussi say maantay hain her roz woh aik shaan mein hai
Phir tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
(Jinno aur insanon kay giroho!) unqareeb hum tumhari taraf poori tarah mutawajja hojayen gey
Phir tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhut ao gey
Aey giroh-e-jinnaat-o-insan! zamin kay kinaron say bahir nikal janay ki taqat hai to nikal bhago! baghair ghalba aur taqat kay tum nahi nikal saktay
Phir apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Tum per aag kay sholay aur dhuwan chora jayega phir tum muqabla na ker sako gey
Phir apney rab ki nematon mein say kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Pus jabkay aasman phat ker surkh hojaye jaisay kay surkh chamra
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Uss din kissi insan aur kissi jinn say uss kay gunahon ki pursish na ki jayegi
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Gunahgaar sirf huliye say hi pehchan liye jayen gey aur unki peshaniyon kay baal aur qadam pakar liye jayen gey
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Yeh hai woh jahannum jissay mujrim jhoota jaantay thay
Uss kay aur kholtay huye garum paani kay darmiyan chakkar khayen gey
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Aur uss shaks kay liye jo apney rab kay samnay khara honay say dara do jannaten hain
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
(Dono jannaten) boht si tehniyon aur shakhon wali hain
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Inn dono (jannaton) mein behtay huye chashmay hain
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Inn dono jannaton mein her qisam kay mewon ki do qismen hongi
Phir tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Jannati aisay farashon per takkiya lagaye huye hongay jinkay astar dabeez resham kay hongay aur inn dono jannaton kay meway bilkul qareeb hongay
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlaogey
Wahan (sharmeeli) neechi nigah wali hooren hain jinhen unn say pehlay kissi jinn-o-ins ney hath nahi lagaya
Pus apney paalnay walay ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhtlao gey
Woh hooren misil yaqoot aur mongay kay hongi
Pus tum apney perwerdigaar ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Ehsan ka badla ehsan kay siwa kiya hai
Pus apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Aur inn kay siwa do jannaten aur hain
Pus tum apney perwerish kernay walay ki kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Jo dono gehri sabz siyahi maeel hain
Batao abb apney perwerdigaar ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhtlao gey
Inn mein do(josh say) ubalnay walay chashmay hain
Phir tum apney rab ki kon konsi nemat ko jhutlao gey
Inn dono mein meway aur khajoor aur anaar hongay
Kiya abb bhi rab ki kissi nemat ki takzeeb tum kerogay
Inn mein nek seerat khoobsurat orten hain
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
(gori rangat ki) hooren jannati khemon mein rehnay waaliyah hain
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Unnko hath nahi lagaya kissi insan ya jinn ney iss say qabal
Pus apney perwerdigaar ki kon konsi nemat ko jhtlao gey
Sabz masnadon aur undah farshon per takkiya lagaye huye hongay
Pus tum apney rab ki kiss kiss nemat ko jhutlao gey
Teray perwerdigar ka naam ba barkat hai jo izzat-o-jalal wala hai
Jab Qayamat qaeem hojaye gi
Jiss kay waqaye honay mein koi jhoot nahi
Woh pust kernay wali aur buland kernay wali hogi
Jab kay zameen zalzala kay sath hila di jayegi
Aur pahar bilkul reza reza kerdiye jayen gey
phir woh misil paragandah ghubaar kay hojayen gey
Aur tum teen jamaton mein hojaogey
pus dahanay hath walay kaisay achay hain dahanay hath walay
Aur bayen hath walay kiya haal hai bayen hath walon ka
Aur jo aagey walay hain woh to aagay walay hi hain
Woh bilkul nazdeeki haasil kiye hain
Nematon wali jannaton mein hain
(Boht bara) giroh to aglay logon mein say hoga
Aur thoray say pechlay. logon mein say
yeh log sonay kay taaron say banay huye takhton per
aik doosray kay samnay takiya lagaye bethay hongay
Inn kay pass aisay larkay jo humesha(larkay hi) rahen gey aamdoraft keren gey
Aabkhoray aur jug ley ker aur aisa jaam ley ker jo behti hui sharab say pur ho
jiss say na sir mein dard ho na aqal mein fatoor aaye
Aur aisay meway liye huye jo inki pasand kay hon
Aur parindon kay gosht joenhein marghoob hon
Aur bari bari aankhon wali hoorien
Jo chupay huye motiyon ki tarah hain
Yeh sila hai unkay aemaal kal
Na wahan bakwas sunein gey aur na gunnah ki baat
Sirf salam hi salam ki awaz hogi
Aur dahanay hath walay kiya hi achay hain dahanay hath walay
Woh baghair kanton ki bairiyon
Aur teh ba teh keelon
Aur lambay lambay sayon
Aur behtay huye paaniyon
Aur ba-kasrat phalon main
Jo na khatam hon na rok liye jayen
Aur unchay unchay farshon mein hongay
Hum ney unn(Ki biwiyon ko) khaas tor per banaya hai
Aur hum ney unhen kanwariyan banadiya hai
Mohabbat waliyan aur hum umar hain
Dayen hath walon kay liye hain
jamm-e-ghafeer aglon main say
Aur boht bari jamat hai pichlon main say
Aur bayen hath walay kiya hai bayen hath walay
Garum hawa aur garum paani mein (hongey)
Aur siyah dhuyen kay saye mein
Jo na thanda hai na farhat buksh
Be-shak yeh log iss say pehlay boht nazon mein palay huye thay
Aur baray baray gunahon per israr kertay thay
Aur kehtay thay kay kiya jab hum mar jayengey aur mithi aur haddi hojayengey to kiya hum phir doobara utha kharay kiye jayeugey
Aur kiya humaray aglay baap dada bhi
Aap keydijiye kay yaqeenan sab aglay aur pichlay
zaroor jama kiye jayegey aik muqarra din kay waqt
Phir tum aey gumraho jhutlanay walon
Albatta khanay walay ho thoher ka darakht
Aur ussi say pet bharnay walay ho
Phir uss per garum kholta paani peenay walay ho
Phir peenay walay bhi piyasay unton ki tarah
Qayamat kay din unki mehmaain yeh hai
Hum hi ney tum sab ko peda kiya hai phir tum bawer nahi kertay
Acha phir yeh to batlao kay jo mani tum tapkatay ho
kiya uss ka (insane) tum banatay ho ya peda kernay walay hum hi hain
Hum hi ney tum mein mot ko mutaeyen kerdiya hai.aur iss say haray huye nahi hain
Kay tumhari jagah tum jaisay aur peda kerden. aur tumhen naye siray say uss aalam mein peda keren jiss say tum (bilkul) beykhabar ho
Tumhen yaqeeni tor per pehli dafa ki pedaaeesh maloom hi hai phir kiyon ibrat hasil nahi kertay
Acha phir yeh bhi batlao kay tum jo kuch botay ho
Ussay tum hi ugatay ho ya hum uganay walay hain
Agar hum chahyen to ussay reza reza ker dalen aur tum heyrat kay sath baten banatay hi reh jao
Kay hum per to tawaan hi par gaya
Bulkay hum bilkul mehroom hi reh gaye
Acha yeh batao kay jiss pani ko tum peetay ho
Ussay baadlon say bhi tum hi utartay ho ya hum barsatay hain
Agar humari mansha hoto hum issay kerwa zehar kerden phir tum humari shukar guzari kiyon nahi kertay
Acha zara yeh bhi batao kay jo aag tum sulgatay ho
Iss kay darakht ko tum ney peda kiya hai ya hum uss kay peda kernay walay hain
Hum ney issay sabab-e-naseehat aur musafiron kay faeeday ki cheez banaya hai
Pus apney boht baray rab kay naam ki tasbeeh kiya kero
Pus mein qasam khata hun sitaron kay girnay ki
Aur agar tumhen ilm hoto yeh boht bari qasam hai
Kay be-shak yeh quran boht bari izzat wala hai
Jo aik mehfooz kitab mein darj hai
Jissay sirf pak log hi chu saktay hain
Yeh rabul aalameen ki taraf say utra hua hai
Pus kiya tum aisa baat ko sirsari (aur mamooli) samajh rahe ho
Aur apney hissay mein yehi letay ho kay jhutlatey phiro
Pus jabkay rooh narkharay tak phonch jaye
Aur tum uss waqt aankhon say dekhtay raho
Hum uss shaks say banisbat tumharay boht ziyadah qareeb hotay hain lekin tum nahi dekh saktey
Pus agar tum kissi kay zair-e-farman nahi
Aur iss qol mein sachay hoto (zara) iss rooh ko to lotao
Pus jo koi barah-e-elaahi say qareeb kiya hua hoga
Ussay to rahat hai aur ghizayen hain aur aaram wali jannat hai
Aur jo shaks dahanay walon mein say hai
To bhi salamti hai teray liye kay tu dahanay walon mein say hai
Lekin agar koi jhut lanay walon gumrahaon mein say hai
To kholtay huye garum pani ki mehmaani hai
Aur dozakh mein jana hai
Yeh khabar sirasir haq aur qaton yaqeeni hai
Pus tu apney azeem-ul-shaan perwerdigar ki tasbeeh ker
Aasmanon aur zamin mein jo hai (Sub) Allah ki tasbeeh ker rahey hain woh zabardast ba-hikmat hai
Aasmanon aur zamin ki badshahat ussi ki hai.woh hi zindagi deta hai aur mot bhi aur woh her cheez per qadir hai
Wohi pehlay hai aur wohi peechay wohi zahir hai aur wohi makhfi aur woh her cheez ko bakhoobi janney wala hai

Wohi hai jiss ney aasmanon aur zamin ko cheh (6) din mein peda kiya phir arsh per mustawi hogaya Woh (Khoob) jaanta hai uss cheez ko zamin mein jaye aur jo uss say niklay aur jo aasmanoon say neechay aaye. aur jo kuch Charh ker uss mein jaye aur jahan kahin tum ho woh tumharay sath hai aur jo tum kerahey ho Allah dekh raha hai
Aasmanoon ki aur zamin ki baadshahi ussi ki hai aur tamam kaam ussi ki taraf lotaye jatay hain
Wohi raat ko din mein lejata hai aur wohi din ko raat mein dakhil kerdeta hai aur seenoon kay bhedon ka woh poora aalim hai

Allah per aur uss kay raool per eman ley aao aur uss maal mein say kharch kero jiss mein Allah ney tumhen doosron ka janasheen banaya hai pus jo tum mein say eman leyen aur kheraat keren unhen boht bara sawab milay ga
Tum ALLAH per eman kiyon nahi latay ? Halankay khud rasool tumhen apney rab per eman lanay ki dawat dey raha hai agar tum momin ho to who to tum say mazboot ehad-o-paymaan bhi ley chukka hai
Woh (ALLAH) hi hai jo apney banday per wazeh aayaten utaarta hai takay who tumhen andheron say noor ki taraf ley jaye yaqeenan ALLAH taalaa tum per narmi kernay wala reham kernay wala hai

kertay' darasal aasmanon our zamin ke meeress ka malik (tanha) Allah hi hai tum main say jin logo ney fatah say pehlay fi subilillah diya hai our qitaal kiya hai woh (doosron kay) barabar nahi bulkay unn say boht baray darjay kay hain jinhon nay fatah kay baad kheyraaten den our jahad kiyey haan bhalaee ka wada to Allah taalaaka unn sab say hai jo kuch tum ker rahey ho uss say Allah khabardaarhai
Kon hai jo Allah taalaa ko achi tarah qarz dey phir Allah Taalaa issay uss kay liye barhata chala jaye our uss kay liye pasandeedah ajar sabit hojaye

(Qayamat Kay) din tu dekhay ga kay momin mardo our orton ka noor unn kay aagay aagay our unkay dayen dor raha hoga aaj tumhen inn jannaton ki khushkhabri hai jinkay neechay nehren jaari hain jin main humesha ki rehaeesh hai yeh hai bari kaamyabi

Uss din munafiq mard-o-orat eman walon say kahan gay kay humara intizar to kero kay hum bhi tumharay noor say kuch roshni hasil kerlen jawab diya jayega kay tum apney peechay lot jao our roshni talash kero phir inkay our unkay darmiyan aik deewar haaeel kerdi jayegi jiss main darwaaza bhi hoga uss kay androoni hissay main to rehmathogi our bahir ki taraf azab hoga

Yeh chilla chilla ker unn say kahen gey kay kiya hum tumharay sath na thay woh kahengay kay haan thay to sahi lekin tum ney apney app ko fitnay mein phansa rakha tha our intizar mein hi rahey our shak-o-shuba kertay raheyour tumhen tumhari fazool tamannao ney dhokay mein hi rakha yahan tak kay Allah ka hukum aa phoncha our tumhen Allah kay baray mein dhoka denay walay ney dhokay mein hi rakha
Algharz aaj tum say na fidya (aur na badla) qabool kiya jayega our na kafiron say tum (sab) ka thikana dozakh hai wohi tumhari rafiq hai our woh bura thikana hai

Kiya abb tak eman walon kay liye waqt nahi aaya kay unkay dil zikar-e-elaahi say our our jo haqutar chuka hai uss say narum hojayen our unki tarah na hojayen jinhen unn say pehlay kitab di gaee thi phir job inn per aik zamana dorazguzer gaya to unkay dil sakht hogaye our inn mein boht say faasiq hain
Yaqeen mano Allah hi zamin ko uss ki mot kay baad zinda kerdeta hai hum ney to tumharay liye apni aayaten biyan kerdin takay tum samjho
Be-shak sadqa denay walay mard our sadqa denay wali orten our jo Allah ko khuloos kay sath qarz dey rahey hain unkay liye yeh barhaya jayega our unn kay liye pasandeedah ajar-o-sawab hai

Allah our uskay rasool per jo eman rakhtay hain wohi log apney rab kay nazdeek siddiq our shaheed hain unkay liye unka ajar our unka noor hai our jo log kufur kertay hain our humari aayaton ko jhutlatay hain woh jahannomi hain

Khoob jaan rakho kay duniya ki zindagi sirf khel tamasha zeenat aor aapas main fakhar (o-ghuroor) our maal-o-olad main aik ka doosary say apney aap ko ziyadah batlana jaisay barish aur iss ki padawaar kisanon ko achi maloom hota hai phir job woh khushk hojati hai to zard rang main iss ko tum dejhtey ho phir woh bilkul choora choora hojatai hai our aakhirat main sakht azab aur Allah ke maghfirat our razamandi hai our duniya ki zundagi ba-juz dhokay kay saman kay our kuch bhi to nahi

(Aao) doro apney rab ki maghfirat ki taraf our uss jannat ki taraf jiss ki wussat kay barabar hai yeh unkay liye banaee gaee hai jo Allah per aur uskay rasoolon per eman rakhtay hain yeh Allah ka fazal hai jissay chahye dey aur Allah bara fazl wala hai
Na koi museebat duniya main aati hai na (Khaas) tumhari jaanon main magar iss say pehlay kay hum usko peda keran woh aik khaas kitab main likhi hui hai yeh (kaam) Allah taalaa per (bilkul)aasan hai
Takay tum apney say fol shuda kissi cheez per ranjeedah na hojoya kero our na attakerdah cheez per itra jao.our itranay walay shekhi khoron ko Allah pasand nhifarmata
Jo (khud bhi) bulkul keren aur doosron ko (bhi) bulkhul ki taleem dea Suno! jo bhi main pheray Allah beyniaz aur sazawaar hamd-o-sana hai

yaqeenan hum ney apney payghambaron ko khuli doleelen dey ker bheja our unkay sath kitab our meean nazilfarmaya. takay log adal per qaeem rahein aur hum ney lohey ko utara jiss mein sakht hebat-o-qooat hai aur logon kay liye aur bhi (boht say) faeeday hain aur iss liye bhi kay ALLAH jaan ley kay uski aur uss kay rasoolon ki madad bey dekhay kon kerta hai be-shak ALLAH qooat wala aur zabardast hai

Be-shak hum ney nooh aur ibrahim (aleh-e-salam) ko (payghumber banaker) bheja aur hum ney inn dono ki olad mein payghumbari aur kitab jari rakhi to inn mein say kuch to raah yafta huye aur inn mein say aksar boht nafarman rahey

Inn kay baad phir bhi hum apney rasoolon ko pay-dar-pay bhejtay rahey aur inn kay baad Essa bin mariyum(aleh-e-salam) ko bheja aur unhen injeel ata farmaee aur unn kay mannay walon kay dilon mein shafqat aur reham peda kerdiahaan rehbaniyat (tark-e-duniya) to un logon ney unn per issay wajib na kiya tha siwaye ALLAH ki raza joee kay so so unhon ney iss ki poori riyat na ki phir bhi hum ney unn mein say jo eman laye thay unhen unka ajar diya aur unn mein ziyadaah tar log nafarman hain

Aey woh logon jo eman laye ho ALLAH say dartay raha kero aur uss kay rasool per eman lao ALLAH tumhen apni rehmat ka dohra hissa dey ga aur tumhen noor dey ga jiss ki roshni mein tum chalo gey phiro gey aur tumharay gunah bhi moaaf farma dey ga ALLAH bakshnay wala meharbaan hai

yeh iss liye kay ehl-e-kitab jaan lein kay ALLAH kay fazal kay kissi hissay per bhi unhen ikhtiyar nahi aur yeh kay (sara) fazal ALLAH hi kay hath hai woh jissay chahye dey aur ALLAH hai hi bara fazal wala
